text: Ezɨ gɨn, Ismael Mispan itir gumazamizir igharaziba inigha, Mispa ategha, men akua Amonɨn kantrin zui. Babilonɨn mɨdorozir gumazibar dapanim Nebusaradan, a faragha gumazamizir kaba, Mispan nguibamɨn me ataghizɨ me itima, a men ganasa Gedalia amɨsefe. Ezɨ Judan atrivimɨn guiviba uaghan men tongɨn iti.
